title: Deeper Illusions
description: Iris and her beautiful Prince Charming, Ryan, are now married. But the issues facing the two only get more complicated and dark. Iris is finding that being married to a man with such a dark past keeps threatening her present and the couple's future.  But the issues from the past do not compare to the devastating issues in the present. A tragic chain of events leads to a possible end of the fairytale...
author: Annie Jocoby
